briefTitle: Improving Decision Role Concordance in Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: An Intervention to Improve Decision Role Concordance Amongst Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Decision role concordance before and after a surgical consultation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients who present to Huntsman Cancer Hospital/University of Utah for a newly diagnosed breast cancer surgical consultation.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Men with breast cancer.
* Patients who have previously seen another medical provider to discuss treatment for newly diagnosed breast cancer.
